body_html:
I just realized that what I wanted is to be accomplished this way:

>>> x = tf.Variable(tf.zeros([10]))
>>> tf.gradients(tf.complex(x, tf.zeros([10])), x)
[<tf.Tensor 'gradients_4/Complex_5_grad/Real:0' shape=(10,) dtype=float32>]

body:
I just realized that what I wanted is to be accomplished this way:

```
>>> x = tf.Variable(tf.zeros([10]))
>>> tf.gradients(tf.complex(x, tf.zeros([10])), x)
[<tf.Tensor 'gradients_4/Complex_5_grad/Real:0' shape=(10,) dtype=float32>]
```
